Hello,

Sizes:
1x/22
3x/24

Price is not negotiable, buyer must take the entire lot and pay all escrow fees.

Block Details:

- No spam, malware, etc
- No history or abuse or abuse complaints
- Perfectly clean

Please direct message for more details.
